'''A Breakthrough in Craft''' is the second part of the [[Alchemical Ascension]] event.

==Quests==
* [[A Breakthrough in Craft (Quest)|A Breakthrough in Craft]]

==Summary==
;A Breakthrough in Craft

After a period of time, the business is booming with a lot of orders coming in and the Traveler and Paimon has been working nonstop. Paimon suggests [[Lisa]] to hire more help as they have been having trouble with keeping up. Lisa tells her that she has been working with [[Freda]] to came up with a plan to make the business more efficient and tells them to talk with Freda for more details. Freda explains that they can increase the efficiency of the business in three areas — brewing, cultivation, and sales. With the upgrade preparation has been made, she goes to show them how to do so.
